name: Flippin' Puzzles
description:
This game was created for the 2022 Epic MegaJam.  Use your controller to move the player around the board. Rotate the board to see different angles and solve puzzles. Flip the board over to reveal the answers to the board and decipher the puzzle. Press the button next to the door to complete the level and continue on. Will you make it to the end?

Play it one of three ways.
VR Oculus - 
Use the left joystick to move the character  around
Right joystick rotates platform

B is for interact

A is for jump

XBox Controller (With or without VR Headset) - 
Use the controller to move the player and board around
Left joystick moves the player
B and X rotate the board
Y flips the board
A to Jump
Right Bumper to press the button to open the door

Keyboard - 
WASD to move character around
Right and left arrow key to rotate the board
Down arrow key to press the button and open the door
Up arrow key to flip the board

This game is a work in progress, UE5 bugged out and capped the VR framerate at 60fps which affects physics and the puzzles, the game can be played on desktop without headset and must be started without headset connected to do so.
